description: Try our easy to follow Steamed Mussels & Garlic Cauliflower Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Steamed Mussels & Garlic Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For the mash, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place whole garlic on a square of foil. Spray with oil then wrap and roast for 40 minutes or until very soft.

Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Add 850g cauliflower and cook for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain well. Squeeze the soft garlic from the bulb into a food processor. Add cauliflower and 2/3 cup ricotta. Process until smooth. Season and keep warm.

Heat oil and butter in a large saucepan over high heat. Add onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened. Add wine and mussels and cover with a lid. Steam for 2-3 minutes, shaking the pan. Uncover and stir through herbs. Serve mussels with cauliflower mash and crusty bread.
